videoToGif.clickToConvert: Click the button to start converting video to GIF

tips.lowResolution: Lower resolution and frame rate can reduce file size

videoTranscodeConfig.title: Video Transcode Settings
videoTranscodeConfig.pageDescription: Convert video format and resolution, supports MP4, WebM, MKV, MOV output

resolutionDesc.480P: Standard definition, smaller file size, suitable for network transmission
resolutionDesc.720P: High definition, balanced quality and file size
resolutionDesc.1080P: Full HD resolution, best visual quality

formatDesc.mp4: MP4 format has the best compatibility, suitable for most devices and platforms
formatDesc.webm: WebM format is suitable for web playback with high compression efficiency
formatDesc.mkv: MKV format supports multiple codecs and is feature-rich
formatDesc.mov: MOV format is developed by Apple with good QuickTime compatibility

videoTranscodeConfig.clickToConvert: Click the button to start transcoding video
videoTranscodeConfig.conversionSuccess: Video transcode successful! File has been saved to your device
videoTranscodeConfig.dropYourVideoHereOrClickToBrowse: Drop your video here or click to browse
videoTranscodeConfig.supportedFormats: Supports MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV and other formats, max 500MB

tips.formatCompatibility: MP4 format has the best compatibility for most devices
tips.resolutionChoice: Choose appropriate resolution to balance quality and file size
tips.resolutionQuality: Higher resolution provides clearer quality but larger file size
tips.webmAdvantage: WebM format has advantages in network transmission
tips.processingTime: Processing time depends on file size and compression settings

videoToAudio.title: Audio Export Settings
videoToAudio.pageDescription: Extract audio from video files, supports MP3, WAV, OGG output formats

formatDesc.mp3: MP3 format offers good compatibility and smaller file sizes
formatDesc.wav: WAV format provides lossless audio quality, but larger files
formatDesc.ogg: OGG format is an open-source audio format with good compression

qualityDesc.high: Best audio quality, suitable for music and high-demand scenarios
qualityDesc.medium: Balanced quality and file size, suitable for general use
qualityDesc.low: Smallest file size, suitable for voice or low-demand scenarios

videoToAudio.clickToConvert: Click the button to start extracting audio from video

videoToAudio.supportedFormats: Supports MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV and other formats, max 500MB

tips.formatCompatibility: MP3 format has the best compatibility for most players
tips.qualityVsSize: Higher audio quality will result in larger files
tips.losslessQuality: WAV format provides lossless audio, suitable for professional use

metadata.title: Video Tools - Professional Online Video Processing Tools
metadata.description: Free online video processing tool collection. Supports video to GIF, GIF to video, video transcoding, video compression, video trimming, audio extraction and more.
